document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Boheman, C. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Boheman, C. H. (1835) [new taxa]. In: Schonherr, C. J., Genera et species Curculionidum. cum synovmia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal. C. H. Boheman. et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 4 (1). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. [1836] https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. West Palearctic (excluding north) ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
93 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , IMC ) from 15 provinces were studied.
Donetsk Prov.
:
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Svyatohirsk Distr. , Tetyanivka , Donets River , Arnoldi leg.,
17.vi.1938
;
spec. ( SIZK ) Sloviansk Distr. , Bohorodichne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
on
Chenopodium urbicum
,
22.vi.1983
;
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Lyman Distr. , Zakitne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
21.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novoazovsk Distr. , Samsonove , Khomutovskyi Step Nature Reserve, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
17.vi.1983
;
Luhansk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Severodonetsk , right bank of Siversky Donets River, B. V . Volkov leg.,
22.xii.1979
;
4 spec. ( SIZK ) Milove Distr. , Striltsivskyi Step Nature Reserve ,
24.v.1949
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Sverdlovsk Distr. , Provalskyi Step Nature Reserve ,
19.vi.1947
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Stanytsia Luhanska Distr. , Nova Ilyenko, S. V . Volovnik leg., [
vii.1983
]
.;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Sverdlovsk Distr. , Provalye , Korolivsky Rocks, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
2.vii.1983
;
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilovodsk Distr. , Horodyshche , Derkul River floodland,
2.vi.1933
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Svatove ,
5.vi.1953
;
Mykolaiv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Bratske , Forestry ,
2.vi.1955
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Snihurivka Distr. , Svitla Dacha , V . K. Rafalskyj leg.,
10.vi.1962
;

Sumy Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN )
Sumy env., Benois leg., 1891;
Zaporizhia Prov.
: 2 spec. ( SIZK ) Berdyansk ,
15.vi.1941
; 5 spec. ( SIZK )
Zaporizhia , Khortitzya Island ,
on
Chenopodium , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
13.viii.1982
; 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Yakymivka Distr. , Altagir , Altagir forest , S. V
.
Volovnik leg.,
2.vi.1980
; 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr. , Kamyani Mohyly Reserve, S. V
. Volovnik leg., 14.vi.1983 .

Biology. Secondary grasslands, forests, salty and ruderal habitats. Adults occur in V–VIII. Oligophagous on
Chenopodium
,
Kochia
,
Suaeda
,
Anabasis
spp.— Chenopodioideae ( Amaranthaceae ) ( Behne 1981 ; Dieckmann 1983 ; Krivosheina 1975 ; Nikulina 1989 ; Volovnik 1994b ).
